title: FastFilterItem
description: FastFilterItem is a control item that can be added to the filter feedback bar.

Label.description: Displays a label text concatenated with colon sign before the `DisplayValue` of the item.

FilterProperty.description: The name of the property for filter on. This property must not be set if the `ReturnValue` is a custom query.

CustomQueryGroup.description: A unique name to mark several fast filter items as a query group. The value will also match with filters in standard filter page based on _Name of the filter. This property is to be set only when `ReturnValue` is a custom query.

DisplayValue.description: The value to display to the user. If not specified, the `ReturnValue` will be used.

ReturnValue.description: The value to return on selection. The `ReturnValue` can be set as query to execute as filter as well, it supports lambda queries and queries with binding property.
